title: Applications Engineer, Facetime - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with physical space. The Vision Pro FaceTime Team is looking for software engineers to help build Apple’s personal communication experiences on the next generation spatial computing platform.
description: The Vision Pro FaceTime team works on deeply integrating FaceTime & SharePlay on visionOS, as well as delivering the Spatial Personas experience that fosters real-time spatial collaboration and communication. They work in Swift and Objective C to build core frameworks supporting FaceTime and SharePlay on visionOS. Successful engineers work from UI down to networking, protocols, and system integration layers.
preferred_qualifications: Interest and passion for AR/VR technologies, Optional: Experience with Unix development, daemons, cross-process communication, etc., Optional: Experience with 3D math/linear algebra, 3D graphics, etc
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role ranges between $55.64 and $83.75/hr. Total compensation includes progress opportunities, discretionary employee stock programs, comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and services, educational expense reimbursement, discretionary bonuses, relocation, and more. Visit Apple Benefits page for more information.
